message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 3-6-2, translated into en
data: Corresponding international indicator “3.7.2: Adolescent birth rate (aged 10-14 years; aged 15-19 years) per 1,000 women in that age group”. The international indicator is disaggregated by: Age, education level, number of children alive, marital status, socioeconomic status, geographical location and others while the Vietnamese indicator is disaggregated by : Education level of the mother; age group (10-14 years old, 15-19 years old); urban/rural and province/city directly under the Central Government
